1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who lives with family. You love your family but you wish that you can be free and more adventurous and your family doesn’t help.

Your mother Toni is overly caring about you, Your Father Jon is a workaholic but his alway craving sex, your older sister Katherine doesn’t care about you and is more concerned with her own pleasures and your housekeeper Ana is kind but kind of simple (still gorgeous).

One day you are actually desperate enough to wish Upon a star for something really different to happen in your life.

The next morning you find your self in a strange environment. You look around, you realise that you are the same size as an Ant and your bed looks like a soft desert.

You panic as you didn’t want to be in this state but then someone enters your room...
1.title: Shrunk

info.brief_description: You have shrunk and must survive your Unaware family
info.description:
You are Jack a 13 year old boy who gets shrunk and must the survive your Godzilla sized family.

FAMILY:
Toni (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001057/mediaviewer/rm1001688321) - Your Mother

Katherine (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm7692698/mediaviewer/rm2852030209) - Your Older Sister

Jon (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0358316/mediaviewer/rm2388763136) - Your Father

Ana (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1869101/mediaviewer/rm4110255873) - Your House Keeper

RULES:
Keep It Unaware (If Found He Is A Toy Or Bug)
Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
No Deaths
Try To Describe What Their Wearing (Or Use Images)
